channel.title: SMDScape || 24/7 || Join Now!
channel.description:
[URL=http://s1355.photobucket.com/user/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/media/banner_zpseadeb40e.png.html][IMG]http://i1355.photobucket.com/albums/q706/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/banner_zpseadeb40e.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://"http://smdscape.nazuka.net/play.php"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/g3gfTLf.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://"http://smdscape.nazuka.net"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7YIOxgN.png[/img][/URL]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ysuyYR5.png[/img]
[ul][*]100% up-time, No lag [*]4 minigames including Fight pits, Tzhaar fight cave, Barrows and Duel arena [*]bosses to battle for rare drops which include Dagannoth Kings, God Wars Dungeon bosses, Chaos Elemental, Corporeal Beast, Tormented Demon, Ice Strykewyrm, Barrelchest and King Black Dragon [*]Money making via skilling, obtain the resources such as ores, logs etc.. and sell them to a Npc, up to 15m/h for each skill[/ul]
[IMG]http://i1355.photobucket.com/albums/q706/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/SOF_zps796077ae.png[/img][URL=http://s1355.photobucket.com/user/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/media/skilling_zpsa0563de8.png.html][IMG]http://i1355.photobucket.com/albums/q706/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/skilling_zpsa0563de8.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s1355.photobucket.com/user/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/media/skilling2_zps84a5d868.png.html][IMG]http://i1355.photobucket.com/albums/q706/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/skilling2_zps84a5d868.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s1355.photobucket.com/user/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/media/pvpzones_zps1a2fdb58.png.html][IMG]http://i1355.photobucket.com/albums/q706/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/pvpzones_zps1a2fdb58.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s1355.photobucket.com/user/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/media/points_zps225933d6.png.html][IMG]http://i1355.photobucket.com/albums/q706/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/points_zps225933d6.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s1355.photobucket.com/user/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/media/playerinfo_zpseab2bb24.png.html][IMG]http://i1355.photobucket.com/albums/q706/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/playerinfo_zpseab2bb24.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s1355.photobucket.com/user/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/media/monsterteleports_zpsbf1e34e0.png.html][IMG]http://i1355.photobucket.com/albums/q706/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/monsterteleports_zpsbf1e34e0.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s1355.photobucket.com/user/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/media/monster2_zps0ea54ae3.png.html][IMG]http://i1355.photobucket.com/albums/q706/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/monster2_zps0ea54ae3.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s1355.photobucket.com/user/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/media/moneypouch_zpsbcf5d2b2.png.html][IMG]http://i1355.photobucket.com/albums/q706/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/moneypouch_zpsbcf5d2b2.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s1355.photobucket.com/user/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/media/minigames_zps1421af9f.png.html][IMG]http://i1355.photobucket.com/albums/q706/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/minigames_zps1421af9f.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s1355.photobucket.com/user/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/media/moneypouch_zpsbcf5d2b2.png.html][IMG]http://i1355.photobucket.com/albums/q706/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/moneypouch_zpsbcf5d2b2.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s1355.photobucket.com/user/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/media/minigames_zps1421af9f.png.html][IMG]http://i1355.photobucket.com/albums/q706/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/minigames_zps1421af9f.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s1355.photobucket.com/user/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/media/loyalty_zps62d38b0c.png.html][IMG]http://i1355.photobucket.com/albums/q706/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/loyalty_zps62d38b0c.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s1355.photobucket.com/user/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/media/lodestoneteles_zps2af7670e.png.html][IMG]http://i1355.photobucket.com/albums/q706/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/lodestoneteles_zps2af7670e.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s1355.photobucket.com/user/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/media/death_zpsd42401ea.png.html][IMG]http://i1355.photobucket.com/albums/q706/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/death_zpsd42401ea.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s1355.photobucket.com/user/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/media/bosses_zpse23a4329.png.html][IMG]http://i1355.photobucket.com/albums/q706/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/bosses_zpse23a4329.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s1355.photobucket.com/user/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/media/bosses2_zpsbe5f0612.png.html][IMG]http://i1355.photobucket.com/albums/q706/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/bosses2_zpsbe5f0612.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s1355.photobucket.com/user/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/media/banksearching_zps40381fe1.png.html][IMG]http://i1355.photobucket.com/albums/q706/Jarrod_Crazzy_Boyd/banksearching_zps40381fe1.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: SMDScape || 24/7 || Join Now!
item.dc:creator: @SMDScapeDev SMDScapeDev
item.description:
@SMDScapeDev wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:17, topic:520470”][quote author=SMDScapeDev link=topic=638969.msg4307290#msg4307290 date=1370113749]
Fix my errors? what errors am I getting?
[/quote]
Thakillah said the webclient doesn’t work and you replied with:

Yes it does it’s just you don’t know how to fix your own errors

You don’t tell your players to fix their own problems, you fix the problem because you want that person to play correct? Supplying shitty support services will make your players quit.[/quote]

He was told to talk to the Client Dev but he didn’t.

Read full topic

item.title: SMDScape || 24/7 || Join Now!
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“SMDScapeDev, post:11, topic:520470”][quote author=thakillah link=topic=638969.msg4307149#msg4307149 date=1370069593]
Leeched.

  1. webclient doesn’t work
  2. Doesn’t know how to make a jar
  3. The cache is still saying deathlyspvp
    [/quote]

Leeched? Considering I’ve coded a fair bit

  1. Yes it does it’s just you don’t know how to fix your own errors
  2. I do I’m to lazy
  3. Because it’s still in beta

now next time you wanna make my advertisement thread look bad atleast ask for help instead of being a lovewit on my site.

Thank you.[/quote]
Hey dumbass, since you’re ‘actually’ coding it, you should fix your own errors, not your players.

Read full topic

item.title: SMDScape || 24/7 || Join Now!
item.dc:creator: @SMDScapeDev SMDScapeDev
item.description:
@SMDScapeDev wrote:

Cause we’re still in Beta stages, any suggestions would be lovely so suggest things either on our forums, chatbox, on this thread or pc me on here.

Read full topic

item.title: SMDScape || 24/7 || Join Now!
item.dc:creator: @Xa1 Xa
item.description:
@Xa1 wrote:

We’re trying our best to improve the server.

If you have suggestions, we’ll take them. It’s only “leeched” because it’s in beta and we’re still working on stuff. I just joined the dev team and I plan to improve the server.

So please leave suggestions.

Read full topic

item.title: SMDScape || 24/7 || Join Now!
item.dc:creator: @kidgoku4522 kidgoku4522
item.description:
@kidgoku4522 wrote:

[quote=“hadlich4, post:5, topic:520470”][quote author=SMDScapeDev link=topic=638969.msg4307118#msg4307118 date=1370063328]

another deathlypvpz v4 leech?

that’s were your wrong, this isn’t just “another leech” I’m actually coding this, I’ve already added working ring of wealth & revenants fixed the polypore staff & way more.

I’m updating stuff daily, mostly what my community wants, I listen to my people unlike other Servers, I add what my players want, it’s based on majority rules.

[/quote]

alright well since deathlypvpz v4 gives you the opportunites if you want to add something community wants or something other servers dont have, then besides adding revenants and fixed polypore staffs add your own custom made staffs and features and minigames. throw some uniqueness into your server[/quote]
ew wouldn’t bother coding this server lmao Releasing a shit deathlypvpz v2 server infact

Read full topic
